name: requirejs-dependencies
description: Finds direct and indirect dependencies of one or more RequireJS modules.
author: Ferdinand Prantl <prantlf@gmail.com> (http://prantlf.tk/)

scripts.build:js: esbuild --outfile=www/js/index.min.js --external:path --external:util --external:child_process --external:fs --format=iife --sourcemap --bundle --minify www/js/index.js && esbuild --outfile=www/js/graph-support.min.js --sourcemap --minify www/js/graph-support.js && esbuild --outfile=www/js/module-support.min.js --sourcemap --minify www/js/module-support.js && esbuild --outfile=www/js/theme-support.min.js --sourcemap --minify www/js/theme-support.js
scripts.build:css: csso www/css/index.css -s file -o www/css/index.min.css && csso www/css/bootstrap.darkly.css -s file -o www/css/bootstrap.darkly.min.css && csso www/css/bootstrap.flatly.css -s file -o www/css/bootstrap.flatly.min.css && html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --remove-attribute-quotes --minify-css true --minify-js true -o www/index.min.html www/index.html
scripts.build:html: html-minifier --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-optional-tags --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --remove-attribute-quotes --minify-css true --minify-js true -o www/index.min.html www/index.html && sed -i "s/VERSION/0.0.8/" www/index.min.html
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run build:ts
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:ts
scripts.fix: npm run fix:js && npm run fix:ts
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run check
